description.p: Free multi-platform database tool for developers, SQL programmers, database administrators and analysts. Supports all popular databases: MySQL, PostgreSQL, MariaDB, SQLite, Oracle, DB2, SQL Server, Sybase, MS Access, Teradata, Firebird, Derby, etc.
This is the official build of DBeaver, packaged into a Flatpak. This repackaging is not supported by DBeaver Community Edition.
